title: Italian trip October trip 2021 amid Covid
text:
First of all it was so nice to speak to a real live person with a clear connection. I had to cancel a reservation after the cancellation date but a week before arrival due to not having results back on Covid test in time in America. Your representative was most helpful and was successful in getting the hotel to drop charges. Whatever the result i appreciated how your agent handled the situation.
Thank you. Also all your recommendations have been exactly what I expected and better for the various hotels.

title: Excellent and memorable stay
text:
I loved everything about this property!

Cleanliness, convenience to the station if you want to visit Vienna frequently, stylish and thoughtful decorations and appliances in the house and in the guests apartment ; amazing hosts who would go above and beyond to make their guests happy‚Ä¶ made my birthday celebration so special and unforgettable‚Ä¶, quietness and peacefulness of the property and it‚Äôs garden! Proximity to the stores, Vienna attractions, as well as the local beautiful castle and the garden next to it .
Would gladly come again, and send my friends and family to this beautiful villa.

title: Don‚Äôt Judge a book
text: So after booking I read reviewed and was skeptical of my choice. When I arrived I again had concerns by the exterior. Once inside the room  it was beautiful . The balcony was beautiful. Sitting at the beach at night,  relaxing. I talked to the staff they were all amazing. Talk to Patty for a few minutes. She is an amazing person with a lot of life to share. Stop and smell the Roses at this place. I can‚Äôt tell you how thankful I stayed‚Ä¶.They have a lot to offer here if you take a minute to see it. The room was super clean, smelled amazing too!

title: Amazing Stay!
text: This place is so lovely. We had such an incredible stay here. The staff are so friendly and helpful. The facilities are extremely clean. This is the perfect spot to stop before or after your Kruger trip or for business! The area is beautiful and you wake up to the birds chirping in the morning, and the tranquility of their pool garden. We were very happy with the security of the area as well. There is parking and options for 24 hour food delivery. Kanebo, the owner, is so wonderful and kind. She is very knowledgeable of the area and beyond. We will definitely be staying here again!

title: Love it
text: I wasn‚Äôt real sure about renting a riverside cottage but i have to say they were great.  Sitting on the porch at night over looking the river talking with my husband and the kids staying in the cottage was great.  Great bed, outdoor grill to cook on..heating and air.. nicely decorated and jetted in suite bath tub and we never ran out of hot water. Lots of big fluffy towels.  We will go back.  My kids are 14 and they loved the access to the river/state park.  We bought a year around pass to the park for the fishing and access to bike and running trails as my daughter is a cross country runner.  My son loves the fishing and is going to bring his bike next time.

title: Specious rooms
text: My stay at Kompose Hotel was a delightful experience, marked by a spacious room, elegant Scandinavian design, and exceptional service. The room's expansive layout and minimalist decor, featuring whites, soft greys, and natural wood, created a tranquil ambiance. The staff's attentiveness and warmth stood out, always ready to assist and enhance my stay. Additionally, the hotel's central location and fine dining options added to the overall convenience and enjoyment. Nordic Haven excels in providing a luxurious, peaceful retreat in the city. I highly recommend it for a top-tier hotel experience for a reasonable price.

title: Galatea Boutique Hotel ‚Äî Fabulous Accommodations and Staff
text: This is just the nicest place.  The staff is cordial, friendly and helpful.  The atmosphere of this charming hotel is exceedingly pleasant.  There is a balcony that is on the upper level overlooking a squared courtyard (very traditional Italian) which is where one can have breakfast.  Breakfast is splendid and the staff serves it up nicely. The hotel and the rooms are clean and well maintained.  The hotel is well located with shopping and dining nearby, and there is easy access to taxis and the metro (the metro is excellent).  The whole package is really marvelous, highly recommended‚ÄºÔ∏è

title: S√®jour fantastique √† Paris!
text: Our stay in Paris was made so much more special because of this quaint little apartment. The host was merveilleuse! It‚Äôs located directly around the corner from one of the most famous markets in the city, Rue Mouffetard. We absolutely loved the location to The Panth√®on (walking distance), and it was only a 40 minute taxi ride to Versailles. We went in 2019 right before the virus shut the world down, and we are *so* very exited to be going back in 2026. We can‚Äôt wait to book with her again! She‚Äôs so helpful and the breakfast is d√®licieuse. ü•∞

title: Good place to stay in a good location.
text: 15 minutes walk to Darling Harbour (4 attractions) and 20 minutes walk to eye tower. 5 minutes walk to china town. Bus & Railway station are few minutes to walk. Plenty of food place. No need car to stay this place. Staff is very friendly & clean. Definitely go back and stay this place again. ‚ÄúCity market‚Äù - Big Chinese market & very cheap to buy souvenirs. Try to avoid buy souvenirs at attraction place and save money. ‚ÄúMetro‚Äù supermarket is near by and sell cooked food which save a lot of money, if u have a big family. - Mathews - Philadelphia - USA

title: Anastasia‚Äôs Oasis
text:
If you find yourself in need of a quiet getaway close to ancient sites on the P√©loponn√®se, look no further than Anastasia‚Äôs. This charming family, run property is a wonderful way to spend a day, week, or month in Greece. 
My partner and I adored our stay here. The private beach, accessible via a winding staircase hugging the cliffs, is small and secluded. Several lounge chairs and umbrellas shade from the Eastern morning sun. In the afternoon, the beach is shaded and perfect for swimming. It‚Äôs magnificent.
The breakfast is to die for! Anastasia works tirelessly to ensure all of her guests are happy and well fed. She personalized our meal to fit our dietary restrictions (vegetarian, gluten free). 
Book ASAP! You will not be disappointed.

title: JennJenn29
text:
This place was great! I took my daughter and my niece just for a night away and to swim.. Took the dog for a small non refundable deposit, but it‚Äôs whatever I get why..The staff were all friendly and attentive. The only issue I had and it wasn‚Äôt that big of an issue was the bathroom door was in front of the toilet and it was hard to shut to get in and off the toilet and in the shower. Idk if it‚Äôs like that in all the rooms or not. 
Other than that it was clean, the pool was a great temperature and everyone that did swim was respectful of the 10 people max allowed in the pool area at a time. 
I would definitely stay here again.

title: Best International App
text:
I travel a lot. I have used the app to book well over 100 hotels all over the US, Canada, Mexico, Japan, and Europe. I have never had any issues with price, bookings or bad ratings. I used to price check and sometimes call the property. Prices are almost always the same.

The new feature showing hotels in proximity to an address is finally here! In the past, I have spent countless hours matching addresses in Maps in order to choose a room close to a destination I have to be at. I have never used the GEO location ‚Äúaround‚Äù feature.

title: Best experience
text:
A big part  of your trip experience is your stay. I must say I truly had the best experience ever. The entire staff were patient, welcoming and caring. We felt very safe princesses. We had no worries at all. I loved that they booked the excursions for us. That was very convenient. 
Even somethings that weren‚Äôt on the typical excursion list they made it happen for us. It was a peaceful, safe, clean and welcoming place to stay. We didn‚Äôt want to leave. We loved each and everyone of the staff. Thank you and we love you all !!

title: Days inn
text:
Felt outdated for a days inn.  Breakfast was nothing special besides the very basics like cereal, fruit, toast....they have one waffle setup.
When we checked in the front desk gentleman seemed overwhelmed and comments about previous coworkers irresponsibility‚Äôs then checked us into a room with other individuals.  We were carrying all our stuff in the freezing cold at night with our kids... to be honest it was terrible and the room we finally got was on the other side of building which is an exterior walkway to get there with freezing kids.  The the room seemed like the sheets were not tight and like they were slept in and I noticed dried urines on the toilet seat which was another indication of an uncleaned room.  At this point I was tired and went and had a good day skiing.

title: Host went Above and Beyond
text: I booked this trip last minute and was welcomed with open arms when I arrived. Jacky was a most gracious host who made sure I was well taken care of and even made accommodations for me to arrive after the check in time. He knew I did not have transportation, so the morning I was set to depart he made me a homemade breakfast and delivered it to my room. I cannot say enough good things about Jacky and his place and this will be where I stay when I return to Palm Springs. Absolutely beautiful home and person!!

title: So nice
text: So I booked this about 5 mins before walking In and when we got there and met the front desk Michelle I believe that was her name let me tell you she is the sweetest person I think I have ever met so nice and helpful she literally made the stay worth it!! I would go back just to see her again! Rooms are super clean and nicely set up pool and hot tub was nice I def recommend and also breakfast was great! And they had a nacho bar in the evening which I have never seen a place do that and thought it was the coolest thing! Very well done microtel!!

title: Garbage App
text: I prepaid and booked my hotel months in advanced. The hotel reservation was confirmed and when I got to the hotel, it was overbooked. This was at a best western with a late check-in available. At that time, customer service was less than useless. They kept repeating the line ‚Äúso would you like to cancel?‚Äù I kept replying ‚Äúno, I need a place to stay.‚Äù They would put me on hold and claim to be looking for something else. Multiple times, customer service would tell me that they found something else in the area. I would show up and the hotel would be full. Booking failed at the minimum job of making sure I had a room after I had already paid for it. I ended up having to sleep in my car on a cold night.

title: Usually a good option
text: Easy enough to place & cancel reservations, just make sure to call the property directly before booking if you are bringing a pet(s). We were on our way to another state & luckily called the hotel before arriving. Although we specified we were bringing our dog on the request, I was told by hotel management that all "pet rooms" were full. Took hours to get the hotel to agree to accept our cancellation & days to get the funds returned to our card. Fortunately, Booking intervened on our behalf. Allegedly, the hotel doesn't see any special requests...

title: Perfect Stay!!! Great Host!!!
text: I was traveling from the USA to visit Armenia and it‚Äôs capital Yerevan. On my way I had 3 airport transfers during which I missed a plane. Arriving late I missed my booking, but apartment owner picked me up in the airport, and arranged another of his apartments, which is even bigger in size an closer to the center of the city. The apartment is very nice and clean. Hayk is very, very helpful, offers city tours,   and is always available if I have any questions. If I decide to visit Armenia again, I will definitely stay in one of Hayk‚Äôs apartments. Thank you very much Hayk!!!

title: Wonderful family trip
text: This hotel is right on the strip and the heart of Branson. The staff was amazing, very friendly and so helpful. It is within walking distance to the trail and the stampede. The first day we were there, I fell coming back from the trail and they gave me alcohol wipes and ice to clean myself up. The room was so clean and the Ac was on when we got into the room. What i love the most is that the front attendant called to make sure everything was to our standards. There was a fridge and microwave in the room. I cant wait to stay again.

title: Awful Customer Service-Security Breach
text: My credit card information was stolen while I was booking a hotel with them, twice in fact. After searching for an hour to find their phone number to contact them (try to find it on their website, good luck!) I was told that they cannot do anything about it and that I should contact my credit card company. Evidently their website is not secured and instead of helping me to resolve the situation they decided to just ignore me and not do anything about it. How is it it possible that while I book a hotel in Hawaii I am also being charged for a hotel in Belize (that also partners with them by the way)??? Figure this out because I still can‚Äôt. Now I have to argue with my bank to credit $3,500 back to my account. Frauds!

title: Hotel day Inn
text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at this lovely hotel and I can confidently say that it was an absolutely exceptional experience from start to finish. From the moment I arrived, the staff were incredibly welcoming, making check-in a breeze.

The room itself was a highlight‚Äîspacious, immaculately clean, and furnished with a comfortable bed and state-of-the-art amenities. The attention to detail was evident, from the high-quality toiletries to the complimentary bottle of wine that awaited me.

The hotel was in the middle of the center, everything is nearby.

title: Unable to give 5 stars
text: I hate giving less then 4 stars on any place, however, the card reader on door was coming off. Took a little while before it read. Had to push door open, and dead bolt lock did not lock! Huge problem with me! The rooms were very clean and sanitary, so was the hotel, I will not complain about that. The covered up hot tube was filled with cement as a quick fix which made it look very tacky. Even the card reader was broken and hanging by wires to get back in hotel! Smh! The breakfast was not good at all. These problems are all fixable. I hope they acknowledge reviews, because it is in their best interest. Really am sorry for the 3 stars! :(

title: Amazing hotel
text:
I came from Dubai with my family, and we were positively surprised with this amazing hotel. The service that we got  from the Hotel team was fantastic, especially from the receptionist I forgot her name she was blonde. She was humble and down to earth, we loved the way she interacted and helped us. God bless her. 
In addition to that, the hotel was clean, the service was fast and the location is incredible. Definitely I would recommend it + I‚Äôll book with them again in my next trip to Paris.

title: Weinhard Hotel
text: We decided to stay here after a wedding so we didn‚Äôt have to drive home in the dark. Initially we chose it because We love hotels that are in old restored buildings. It was nice there was a complimentary breakfast the next morning so we didn‚Äôt have to go find somewhere to eat!! We walked around the hotel and checked out all the artwork and the top roof patio!! We for sure will stay again when we are in that area!! Until then we will be sporting some really comfy hoodies with their logo on the front!!

title: No such thing as ‚ÄúCustomer Service.‚Äù
text: I reserved a hotel room for a weekend trip to visit family. One of the family members I was going to see now has Covid, so the gathering has been canceled. I called the hotel, but since I used this app to book the reservation, I was told that I had to contact them to cancel. I went into the app but there is no way to communicate with anyone. Eventually I found a phone number, but when I called I was advised that international call rates would apply (since their call center isn‚Äôt located in the USA). This is ridiculous. Apparently this is how they make a profit; they can offer low rates because if an issue comes up it is so difficult to communicate that people give up and they keep the money.

title: Solid App for traveling.
text:
I don‚Äôt leave reviews, but this app deserves it. 
Usually when I book a hotel online, I take a bunch of screenshots to save all my booking info, and add it to my calendar and then send a text of the screenshots to my husband. This app has all those features built in! And it saves your reservations to your apple wallet. Very convenient, and I appreciate those little things a lot. I got a great deal on my reservation also, and had the option to pay at the hotel with free cancellation.

title: Nice place but amenities not all functioning
text: Very courteous and helpful staff. Would be a 5 except for the fireplace feature did not work. I had selected this room because I wanted my daughter who has been recovering from a major surgery to have a night away from her room and relax and enjoy  the extra features this room had‚Äî so I opted for the more expensive room. One would think that those who clean the room would make sure all features work well. Just a shame I paid more for this and it didn‚Äôt turn out to expectations. Happens, I guess‚Ä¶..

title: You get what you pay for but with a little extra!
text: The location for this Hotel was great! Everything is walking distance (restaurants, trains and bus) you can walk to Kensington from there too!!! The staff was friendly and service was good. My only complaint was that the room was super tiny and they give you like two tiny towels. If you are planning to go there be sure to get the big rooms not the standard one, other then that it‚Äôs a good decent place to reserve if you are planning to go site seeing all the and not stuck in your room..

title: No pet friendly search option
text: I really enjoy this app. It makes it easy to find a good hotel for a good price. Booking hotels is simple. The only issue I have is that when trying to search for a hotel for an upcoming trip, there was no pet friendly search option. I am planning to bring my dog on my trip and need a hotel that allows dogs. In the search options I could change the amount of rooms or add adults or children but there was no option for pets. I think this is something that should be added on the next update it would make the app even better.

title: Ridiculous Review Aspect
text:
When there are literally crack wwhoorres in the breezeway of the hotel, we should be able to warn other travelers. Period.
This app denied my ability to do so because they are apparently more worried about hurting the tender feelings of prostitutes, than they are about legitimate guests walking blindly into a potentially dangerous environment. There is no appeal. This review is the only way to contact the company.
My 15% discount is NEVER clearly indicated on invoices. The CV19-diminished amenities (no breakfast, no pool, etc.) are not ever considered for further discounts.
If they would just strip the PC police from their corporate decision making committees, this would be a pretty good app.

title: Bargain for NYC
text:
I loved the fact that the hostel is only 1 block from the subway and that the neighborhood is very safe. 

There was plenty of space to lounge around. The kitchen was large and easy to access. My dorm room was well organized and loved having a locker next to my bed. 

My only problem was the cafe. I understand that they are very busy at times. But when I ordered scrambled eggs and sausage off the menu for $3.25, they added stuff to it and charged me for a meal $4.99. They are very good at upgrading your order without discussing the price. Best to order something prepackaged. They can‚Äôt manipulate the order on you.

title: In the Center of Santa Elena
text: The location was great. I thought the property was very unique since we have to hike up a hill to get to our cabin. Very nice landscaping and we saw wildlife. The room was clean but tons of bugs at night. We even found a scorpion in our bathroom. The only problem we had was the hot water not working in our cabin and they were not able to fix it. They offer us another room on the property due to being sold out for both days we were there. We opted in staying in our cabin and took a cold water shower. The staff was very kind and welcoming. I thought the rate was affordable but breakfast was not included.

title: Loved it!!
text:
Honestly I was a bit worried about our stay  after reading some reviews but everything was perfectly NOLA..

All the employees were helpful with recommendations & accommodations! The valet parking attendant was so helpful. Our car was very secure & gate locked nightly. Our room was comfortable with an excellent view. May Baileys had live band every night we stayed. And the cool pool perfect place to soak your feet after a long day of walking. 

I think the complaints are from people who are not used to NOLA. This is not a chain. It‚Äôs a

title: No hot water
text:
Road weary travelers beware. Multiple issues with this ‚Äúold property.‚Äù It started with room keys did not work. 

Third set of room keys worked to get in room. Door had a note on it to lift door handle up while no other doors had this. That should have red flagged this for me, but I was exhausted after a long day of travel. 

I requested a quiet room on booking. This did not happen. Wooden floors sounded like a herd of animals stomping around most night. If I wanted a room with an old creaky floor, I would have chosen a historic home to stay in. 

Last but not least, no hot water in the morning. I let the water run for 30 to try and warm up. My hopeful expectation never happened. Noting better to start a cold day off with a ‚ÄúIce Cold Shower.‚Äù  

On check out, the front desk was not productive at all to settle the issues. They pulled up my phone number from the reservation and said the manager would follow up with me. Not a way to handle a business.  

Save your frustration and stay somewhere else.

title: Leon & ella
text:
Just wanted to share a couple of words on my amazing experience at hibiscus, suite !!! 1st the  location excellent right in the heart of  everything, the hotel staff are super friendly, the breakfast and lunch, a common data, lady amazing friendly and helpful the receptionist, rooms were super clean the view is amazing. Depends if you take an balcony.
Everything was just a one super amazing an easy , would stay again if it came back to the same location would not take a chance with another hotel

title: No Bueno
text: I left one day early on a two day reservation. I also had a $30 fee for an extra person all paid in cash when I left after breakfast Sunday it was my understanding that both me and the owner will try reaching Bookings to cancel. I sent a message to them that night, and they said they took 24 hours to respond. When I called today, Tuesday, the owner says that she didn‚Äôt try to contact Booking then went on about some canceling rules. I checked these and it read 50% return if canceled the day before. The owner was not able to return at least the $30 fee for the bed that was not Used. I gave them my bank account number to have them at least return the $30 Today I learned this was not done either.

title: Good location for flight departures
text:
We selected Blueiby Home because of its location to the airport and price. It‚Äôs a no frills apartment with very comfortable beds, tv, a small kitchenette, small living area and breakfast included. You may have to go up stairs, FYI. 
The host was very gracious and responsive to our needs. We were coming off a Macchu Picchu trip and she was flexible on our checkin.  The next day she helped us catch a taxi to the airport. I would recommend this comfortable little place if you‚Äôve already done Cusco and need convenience.

title: Outstanding-OTTIMO
text: The hotel was the perfect place for our week-long family vacation in Sardegna. The staff was extremely friendly and efficient‚ÄîDario, Martina, Ava, Antonio and Alessandro were always there to make our vacation easy! The breakfast buffet was delicious, the grounds were beautifully kept, the rooms were large and comfortable with an amazing view and the pool was superb. It is a fantastic hotel for pets and children, and Portoscuso and the surrounding area is full of great activities‚Äîthe staff directed us to nearby towns and experiences. Can‚Äôt wait to go back!

title: My most trusted app.
text: I have been a user of this app for as long as I could remember, and it is my go to app when it comes to bookings, I love the platform, interface, and features, and above all the trust in it that grew along the years, I feel confident using it and feel im taken care of during my travels. By far the best booking app there is. I tried a few others but nothing comes close to the user experience and friendliness of this app. Very easy to navigate, a trusted source of reviews and hotel info.

title: Very comfortable, quiet night‚Äôs stay!
text:
Thank you to the Seneca Clipper Inn for a very clean, fresh room and a quiet and comfortable couple of nights‚Äô sleep!
The room was spotless and smelled incredibly fresh! The front desk person was very hospitable and welcoming and we felt very safe. 
The location is perfect.  With a small beverage (beer, pop, misc. items) center, a liquor store and an ice cream/hot dog stand all within walking distance, it was a great location.  And only a 3 minute drive to the Gorge parking lot. 
The A/C was great and kept the room nice and cool!
This was a great price for a really decent room!

title: Need better beds!!!
text: If it wasn‚Äôt for the price and staff I give this location a one star. Lobby looked nice but as soon as you walked passed, hallways and other interior looked very outdated and run down and had a weird smell. Room was nice and big, but beds were hard as boards. Let‚Äôs face it we get a hotel room to sleep in, and the beds are most important. Pillows had no head support, and could not get blackout curtains to close completely. Lots of lights out in parking area, so I could not get room dark. Fresh Texas shaped waffles were only bright star at breakfast. Very disappointed traveler!

title: Very easy, and price was best
text: A group of us were planning a motorcycle trip, to be ‚Äúhubbed‚Äù from one location for several days. Our fearless leader did a lot of checking, and found best price via this app. We each booked our own rooms through Booking, which went extremely smoothly me even though I was using Booking for the first time. Later, when the trip didn‚Äôt make, room cancellation was unexpectedly simple as well. I will certainly be using this app again.

title: My sons first trip to NOLA
text: My family and I had a great trip to NOLA. We could not have asked for a better place to stay. Double Tree hotel and staff were fantastic. The hotel was in a great location. It was in walking distance to everything we wanted to. The aquarium is right there and then Canal is just a few blocks down. It was easy to find and the staff were polite and charismatic. My son is six and he was ready to sell our house and live in the hotel lol. I only wish they had a hot tub with the pool because even though it‚Äôs the south it‚Äôs still to cold to swim but a hot tub is great year round. We will stay at double tree again.

title: Millions of thanks are not enough
text: We‚Äôve been visiting lots of countries all over the world, we‚Äôve considered our stay in this incredible place as one of our best. Pictures online are not exactly showing how amazing the view is for this clean comfortable unit. I have read some nice sweet reviews about Dr. Wafa before visiting that made me wish meeting her. When you meet her, you find out that this kind lady is way beyond amazing, very helpful. She makes sure her guests are served the best way. Millions of thanks are not enough.

title: Worst ever!
text: Total scam! I I called yesterday to see if I could change my sons return flight. First person I talked to couldn‚Äôt even find the reservation on his computer even though I had all the information needed. Then I did online chat. The lady said I could change it and would need to pay upgrade fee and I was fine with that. She changed to upgrade fee three times so I ended paying $300 then an hour later received an email that it couldn‚Äôt be changed. After talking to several people since then and being told to be patient it was still processing nothing has happened and I haven‚Äôt gotten a refund after I requested several times. Looks like I will have to dispute with the credit card company üò°

title: Horrible
text: Used Booking to reserve a hotel for my sister only for her to travel 3 hours and be told that there was an error in the reservation on behalf of booking. When I reached out to booking they said there is no error and they would reach out to the hotel and call me back. My sister is in the lobby and said the hotels phone did not ring. Two hours later booking tells me they can get her a hotel at no additional cost if she couldn‚Äôt be accommodated in the original reserved room. Once it‚Äôs time to book the new hotel I am told we have to pay for the hotel and submit for reimbursement which would take 7-14 days to be reimbursed. A bit misleading on booking‚Äôs part. Never going to use a 3rd party again, save the hassle

title: Lovely place for a holiday
text: property is fantastic with super nice view from the terrace, to have a breakfast here is a one pleasure ‚ù§Ô∏èthe house is very comfortable very nice bedrooms and soft and very comfortable beds,the house is also best with its location, not in the central noisy area but in 5 min walk to the centre from very quiet place‚ù§Ô∏èthe major thing about this house is its host, she got our friend from the beginning of our meeting, she is very Attentive, responsible, supportive, kind, friendly person.I will always choose her place for stay with big pleasure‚ù§Ô∏èü•∞

title: Home away from home
text: This is not a deluxe resort but is the perfect size and place for 2 couples. Each bedroom had its own bathroom. The walk to a beautiful beach was about 15 minutes, also there are many small stores and restaurants nearby. The kitchen was equipped well enough to make a full meal.  The upstairs rooftop room has a large barbecue, small refrigerator, and sink, it was a comfortable place to hangout, have a quiet cup of morning coffee, or dinner at its large table. The pool is quiet and was never crowded. We enjoyed our stay and felt safe.

title: Regina Tucker
text:
I‚Äôm from Tulsa Oklahoma, I stayed here last weekend and I was so pleased with the excellence of management and room quality. Breakfast was second to none with fresh scrambled eggs, boiled eggs, linked sausage, freshly made waffle batter to make your own delicious waffles and more! Large flat screen television to watch while you eat in a very modern and modest eating area with nice table and chairs. 
I came because of the excellent reviews so I am adding my excellent reviews. Maid service was excellent as well! Blessings to you , your family and business. God bless.üôèüèΩ
St John 3:16üôèüèΩ
